Award.AbstractNarration:
This project, based on artificial intelligent (AI) research, focuses on automatic digital facial image analysis with applications that range from security and defense to cosmetics.

This team developed "Emirror", a facial-analysis system that can have broad relevance in many application areas. For example, their technology could serve as a component of "Smart Home" suites, contributing to the development of smart hardware across a broad arena, integrated into facial detection software for security applications, and, used in virtual media or human image enhancement. The outcomes anticipated from this effort may also contribute to new ways of constructing facial analysis algorithms.

Using augmented reality technology, the initial commercial testing of Emirror through I-Corps customer discovery, will focus on cosmetics analysis - including a recommendation system for makeup based on rich facial attributes, thus engaging a new business model in a virtual cosmetic market. Supported by a big-data pool, generated by use cases, this AI system evolves into an expert in whatever field of application is in use -- such as facial recognition, make-up selection, image modification, etc. Beyond applications like virtual makeup try-on, this innovative technology can also be applied to many other fields. For security and defense, this technique can identify, for example, criminals who are camouflaged using heavy makeup. This process is especially important for many safety-centric organizations and activities, such as police departments, security agencies, and public space surveillance systems, where techniques are needed that will improve suspect-verification accuracy.

POR.DRECONTENT:
Virtual makeup technology has been developed with a strong demand to quickly preview the makeup of interest and in the meantime reduce the skin harm by avoiding frequently physical makeup try-on. Existing mobile apps can only provide users a low-quality and circumscribed makeup add-on, an experience that can poorly resonate with customers. The project introduces an innovative artificial intelligent system capable of automatically analyzing the digital facial image layer by layer according to the different makeup materials on the face. This enables a wide-array of novel applications, such as virtual makeup washing, makeup decomposing, cosmetic product recommendations for consumers, photorealistic makeup preview, customized makeup tutorial, etc. For the products born from the innovative technology, prototypes of a mobile app on the IOS platform and a web app have been developed and shown to the potential users for marketing research. A thorough and comprehensive marketing analysis including the feedbacks from potential customers have been conducted, i.e., face-to-face talk and online questionnaire. Herein, more than 120 face-to-face talks and 200 online questionnaires were collected, which shows majority favoring such emerging technologies and many useful feedbacks were achieved to benefit the further development on both technology and business model.

This technology will significantly impact the field of augmented reality. With the big data behind, this AI system could be considered as an expert robot full of makeup experience. Via this novel technology, users can thoroughly analysis the user's face, recommend the makeup based on the rich face attributes. This enables precise advertisement for cosmetics products, which will become a brand new business model in virtual makeup try-on market, on the opposite to the banner ads.

This potential business will influence people to embrace the idea of "Smart Home", and makes the transformation of everyday life. Beyond virtual makeup try-on field, the innovative technologies can also broadly impact security and defense fields, e.g. the criminal suspect identification under a heavy makeup.
